data.text:
What do you know about #Arruaad Path from the King Salman #Scholarship Program in Saudi Arabia? Here is some info: Objective: The Arruaad Path aims to send students to the top 30 educational institutions worldwide across various fields. It covers all disciplines and contributes to enhancing human capital efficiency, achieving sustainable development, and fulfilling the goals of #Saudi #2030vision . Eligibility: Applicants must receive unconditional acceptance from one of the top 30 institutions specified by the program. The acceptance must be final and issued by the university‚Äôs admission office listed in the program, unless the country is non-English speaking. In such cases, conditional acceptance for language study is allowed. Degree Levels Supported: Arruaad supports both bachelor‚Äôs and master‚Äôs degrees. Study Mode: The program supports on-campus study. Common Questions: What is Arruaad? It‚Äôs a path that aims to send students to the world‚Äôs top 30 educational institutions. How can I apply for Arruaad? Obtain direct, unconditional acceptance from one of the specified universities for either bachelor‚Äôs or master‚Äôs programs. Can I apply to multiple universities to increase my chances? Yes, you can submit different applications for different paths, universities, or specializations. For more details, you can visit the official page for the Arruaad Path. https://lnkd.in/er-UnFrb Good Lucküåü
